rules.title: Game Rules
rules.lineMovement: Move along lines one step at a time. No jumping.
rules.shoulderPole: Shoulder Pole (Tiao): Move between two opponent pieces to capture them (O-Me-O).
rules.clamp: Clamp (Jia): Surround an opponent piece with two of yours (Me-O-Me) to capture it.
rules.priority: Priority: If a move creates both Pole and Clamp, Pole takes precedence.
rules.win: Winning: Capture all opponent pieces or trap them in the Maoce (Outhouse).
